description: A React-like component using LightningJS framework that provides an ARIA live region for assistive technologies to announce status updates. It defines a LiveRegion component with message state, role, and aria attributes, and a method to announce messages.

classes.name: LiveRegion
classes.description: A LightningJS component that manages an ARIA live region for screen reader announcements. It updates the message and politeness level to notify users of status changes.

methods.name: announce
methods.description: Public method to trigger a screen reader announcement with specified message and optional politeness level.
